snippet: Citing the “weaker macroeconomic and market environment in Europe,” Tata Steel said that it would take a $1.6 billion write-down, mainly stemming from its acquisition of Corus.
abstract: Citing the “weaker macroeconomic and market environment in Europe,” Tata Steel said that it would take a $1.6 billion write-down, mainly stemming from its acquisition of Corus.

headline.main: As European Acquisition Struggles, Tata Takes $1.6 Billion Write-Down
